tool_description: Validates multi-factor authentication codes submitted by customers.

allow_backup_codes.description: Whether to accept backup recovery codes

error_messages: Invalid code format: Code must contain only digits and match expected length.
Code expired: The authentication code has expired, request a new one.
Code incorrect: The provided code does not match the expected value.
Too many attempts: Maximum validation attempts exceeded, account temporarily locked.
Account not found: Invalid account_id provided.
No active code: No MFA code found for this account, send new code first.
usage: Provide account_id and submitted_code from customer. Set allow_backup_codes=true if backup codes are acceptable.

validation_result.description: Validation result: success, failed, or expired

code_type.description: Type of code validated: mfa or backup

attempts_used.description: Number of attempts used for this code

attempts_remaining.description: Number of attempts remaining before lockout
